comment: Nice apple pie taste, glad its all natural. Good chilled over ice

If you've ever baked an apple pie, and had it boil over in the oven,and then thought, "Wow! I would really enjoy licking the bottom of the oven out after that cools down!", then this whiskey is perfect for you. It's cloudy, it's syrupy, it's licking the bottom of a recently cooled oven while someone shakes a canister of cinnamon over your face. Enjoy!
Very sweet apple, cinnamon.  Good over ice or heated with cider.
